name: Taiga
title: taiga.io
shortDescription: Taiga is a free and open-source project management tool designed for agile teams. It facilitates effective cross-functional teamwork with an intuitive user interface. Users can plan, track, and manage agile projects with features like EPICS, sub-tasks, and various workflow customizations. Companies worldwide use Taiga to reduce stress, strengthen client relationships, and enhance team performance.
cons: May be less suited for non-agile methodologies

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Jira
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Widely used for agile project management

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Asana
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on task lists and basic project tracking
